_meanings:
<ab>N.</ab> of the
daughter of Subala, king of the 
Gāndhāras and wife of Dhṛtarāṣṭra.
[She bore to her husband 100 
sons-Duryodhana and his 99 brothers. As her
husband was blind she always wore a
scarf over her face (probably to reduce
herself to his state). After the 
destruction of all the Kauravas, she and her
husband lived with their nephew 
Yudhishṭhira].
